title: 'It was really wild I got first place', says teenager Gerard after snowboard slopestyle gold
text:
'It was really wild I got first place', says teenager Gerard after snowboard slopestyle gold 7:19am GMT - 01:18 
After winning Olympic gold, 17-year old Red Gerard is now focused on graduating high school ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
